frame.name: Possibility
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Possible_event</fen> is deemed to have some probability of occurrence, if some (generally implicit) further <fen>Condition</fen> pertains. The <fen>Condition</fen>, whether overt or implicit, usually concerns the decision of an agent to attempt to bring the <fen>Possible_event</fen> about. The primary implication is that certain other aspects of the situation that might have been expected to prevent the <fen>Possible_event</fen>, usually lack of capability or permission, do not pertain.
<ex><fex name="Possible_event">You</fex> <t>ca</t> n't <fex name="Possible_event">burn glass</fex> . <fex name="Condition">INI</fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Possible_event">You</fex> <t>can</t> <fex name="Possible_event">have two more</fex> <fex name="Condition">if you want</fex> .</ex> <ex><fex name="Possible_event">This sense of lack</fex> <t>can</t> <fex name="Condition">never</fex> <fex name="Possible_event">be satisfied</fex> .</ex> <ex><fex name="Possible_event">We</fex> just <t>ca</t> n't <fex name="Possible_event">stand it</fex> <fex name="Time">anymore</fex> . <fex name="Condition">INI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Possible_event
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Possible_event</fen> has met its preconditions, and will occur if some further <fen>Condition</fen> holds.
</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the preconditions of the <fen>Possible_event</fen> are met.
<ex><fex name="Circumstances">In this weather</fex>, an experienced pilot <t>can</t> still manage to fly 500 miles.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Cause
FE.definition: <def-root>An entity, event, or state that brings about the possibility of the <fen>Possible_event</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Condition
FE.definition:
<def-root>The state-of-affairs that does not hold, but if it did, the <fen>Possible_event</fen> would occur.
<ex><fex name="Condition">If he wants</fex> , he <t>can</t> have all the fishsticks .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the <fen>Possible_event</fen> can occur.
<ex>You <t>can</t> come in <fex name="Time">now</fex>.</ex></def-root>
